pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tidy Verbs for Dealing with Genomic Data Frames // Handle genomic data within data frames just as you would with 'GRanges'. This packages provides method to deal with genomic intervals the "tidy-way" which makes it simpler to integrate in the the general data munging process. The API is inspired by the popular 'bedtools' and the genome_join() method from the 'fuzzyjoin' package.
